column5: Anyone miss the chilly weather and fresh chrome?
Excellent. Its cool how they were all stacked in the exact same spot on the drift
It was pretty crazy, you can see the waves of fish pushing up at the very back of the run.

I remember back in the day when I used to do a lot of early season steelheading, on a couple of occasions, I would see the wake of fish coming up into the pool. within seconds we would get hooked up. I forgot how fun it used to be watching the float drop.
I love trout fishing. first year I went I tail hooked one and spent 20 minutes wrangling him in and another 20 minutes reviving him.
